name: Kernow Pets
about: Following my teaching career and collaborating with Jamie from a reptile supplies business for my school farm, I was motivated to contribute further. Recognising a real-world problem to solve, I proposed the idea of designing and developing a website for Jamie's business. Prior to my involvement, Jamie relied solely on Facebook and Shop Foot Fall for marketing purposes, lacking a dedicated website. Given the opportunity to work on a commercial project, I aimed to showcase my skills, assist Jamie in expanding his business's reach, and gain valuable experience in stakeholder communication. Throughout the project, we held regular meetings and maintained constant communication for updates, inquiries, and any necessary adjustments. Jamie gave me the freedom to plan and construct a Vite React website utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. With a strong emphasis on user experience (UX) and user interface (UI), the website was developed to optimize page performance and incorporate meticulous attention to detail. Overall, the website successfully addresses the objectives set forth, effectively promoting Jamie's reptile business.
